name: jsdoc-openai-powered-generator
description: Generates JSDOCs for typescript functions, using your OpenAI API key and a specified model

editor/context.when: editorLangId == javascript || editorLangId == javascriptreact || editorLangId == typescript || editorLangId == typescriptreact

jsdoc-openai-powered-generator.model.description: The model to use for generating JSDOCs

jsdoc-openai-powered-generator.prompt.default:
### [TASK]
Document the following code. Specifically, write a jsdoc if it is a function (or similarly suitable), but if it's just normal code, write a comment. Do not include the types when writing a jsdoc.

### [CODE]
{}

### [JSDOC or COMMENT]
jsdoc-openai-powered-generator.prompt.description: The prompt to use for generating JSDOCs. Use an empty object {} to signify the where your code should be inserted inside the prompt.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
